signin_to_dashboard: Sign in to access your dashboard
join_to_analyze: Join to start analyzing your yield
project_report_description: A technical overview of the AgriVisionAI application.
start_analysis_desc: Upload a plant image and set your controls in the sidebar.
awaiting_analysis_desc: The uploaded image is ready. Click 'Analyze & Forecast Harvest' in the sidebar to begin.
analyzed_image_summary: Analyzed the image and found {{count}} detections.
run_analysis_to_see_forecast: Run an analysis to see the short-term harvest forecast.
current_yield_desc: Estimated weight of mature, harvest-ready fruit.
total_forecasted_desc: Total kg planned for harvest in this forecast period.
ready_harvest_forecast_desc: Cumulative harvestable yield over the next {{days}} days.
harvest_plan_desc: Optimized daily schedule based on your capacity.
no_harvest_in_period: No harvest scheduled for this period.
no_yield_data_desc: Run an analysis, then click 'Run Yield Forecast' to get a long-term AI prediction.
total_exp_yield_desc: AI forecast for the full lifecycle of current fruit.
forecast_confidence_desc: AI model's confidence in this forecast.
ai_reasoning_desc: How the AI model arrived at this forecast.
market_forecast_desc: Set parameters for the price forecast.
price_forecast_chart_desc: Price trends for {{district}} over the next {{days}} days.
run_forecast_to_see_trends: Run a forecast to see price trends.
no_price_data_desc: Fill out the controls and run a forecast to see market price predictions.
ai_assistant_desc: After running an analysis, ask me anything about your yield, harvest, or market prices.
ask_about_yield: Ask about your yield, forecast, or prices...
